sentences.en: After meeting with Rotary's delegation, Uttar Pradesh's chief minister vowed to personally monitor eradication progress in the state.
sentences.cn: 北方邦的省长在与扶轮的代表团会面之后，誓言亲自监督该省根除工作的进度。

sentences.en: And we will set our sights on the eradication of extreme poverty in our time.
sentences.cn: 我们还将力争在我们这个时代根除极端贫困的现象。

sentences.en: Antibiotics can selectively target bacteria for eradication , leaving human cells unmolested, in several ways.
sentences.cn: 抗生素通过几种不同的方式来有选择的定位和铲除细菌, 同时不伤害人体细胞.

sentences.en: Eradication of the Alpine nomenclature is still proving a Herculean task.
sentences.cn: 根除阿尔卑斯命名法依然是一项极其艰难的工作.

sentences.en: From that point of view, why not extend our control even into our sleep and rewrite our painful dreams in a general program of nightmare eradication?
sentences.cn: 从这个角度上看，为什么不用一个通用的程序进入到我们的睡眠，改写使我们痛苦的梦境，将梦魇连根拔除？

sentences.en: Given this history, cynicism about the idea of eradication is understandable.
sentences.cn: 有了这段历史, 对根除疟疾的种种嘲讽的行为还是能理解的.

sentences.en: Global polio eradication is the common goal of mankind.
sentences.cn: 在全球范围内消灭脊髓灰质炎是人类的共同目标.

sentences.en: How can districts assist with Polio eradication during national immunization campaigns?
sentences.cn: 地区于全国免疫运动中如何能参与根除小儿麻痹等疾病?

sentences.en: However, they also note that several factors could prevent eradication.
sentences.cn: 然而该病毒具有很强的传染性,需要大范围注射疫苗.

sentences.en: Of the $ 1 billion needed to complete eradication, $ 725 million is pledged or projected.
sentences.cn: 在完成根除所需的10亿美元之中,承诺捐献及预期捐献已经有7亿2, 500万美元.

sentences.en: The biopharmaceutical two ways: one is based on the eradication of bio - pharmaceutical.
sentences.cn: 生物制药的两种方法: 一、是以消灭生物的制药.

sentences.en: The eradication of an established infestation is not easy.
sentences.cn: 根除昆虫蔓延是不容易的.

sentences.en: They work worked to increase activism and donations to the Global Dracunculiasis Eradication Campaign.
sentences.cn: 他们工作为了提升实践主义和捐款数额为了啊啊战役.

sentences.en: This is often required for intelligent control and eradication.

sentences.cn: 这是全世界唯一消除晚癌的一等奖论文证书.

sentences.en: Wallace is mid - way through a six - month, 2,658 - mile - walk to raise US $ 1 million for polio eradication.

sentences.en: We must take this good opportunity to fight an excellent eradication battle.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要把握好时机,打场漂亮的攻歼战.
